name: American Truck Simulator - Washington
detailed_description: Coming later this year, you will deliver cargoes in the Evergreen State of America - Washington. It's a leading lumber producer and the biggest producer of apples, grapes, potatoes and many more products from the food industry. You can find there many manufacturing companies, software developers (shout-out to Valve), and, among other things, Washington is the home of Kenworth.
about_the_game: Coming later this year, you will deliver cargoes in the Evergreen State of America - Washington. It's a leading lumber producer and the biggest producer of apples, grapes, potatoes and many more products from the food industry. You can find there many manufacturing companies, software developers (shout-out to Valve), and, among other things, Washington is the home of Kenworth.
short_description: Coming later this year, you will deliver cargoes in the Evergreen State of America - Washington. It's a leading lumber producer and the biggest producer of apples, grapes, potatoes and many more products from the food industry.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
